title: Chocolate Oreo® cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '200g unsalted softened butter', '200g caster sugar', '150g self raising flour', '50g cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '4 large eggs', '50g dark chocolate, melted', '100ml boiling water', 'For the buttercream', '100g butter', '300g cream cheese', '800g icing sugar', '7 Oreo® biscuits, roughly crushed']
